title: Interpretation of a child in a dream - the meaning of a child in a dream

preview.html: Seeing a child for a single girl, married, pregnant woman, divorced, married or single, whether it is the beautiful little one, the infant, laughing, crying, sad, the child and the girl or the dead boy according to Ibn Sirin and others. Interpretation of seeing a child in a dream. Legal interpreters say that seeing children in a dream portends With a lot of goodness and comfort after distress and an increase in livelihood, but if a person sees in his dream that he is selling a boy, this indicates great relief after distress and delusion. But if a woman sees a child being born in her dream, this indicates a lot of goodness that she will obtain, and this will increase. The better the more beautiful that child is, and the opposite if the beauty of that child decreases and becomes like that. Ugly. This indicates the lack of this livelihood. However, if an unmarried young man dreams of seeing a child wearing a white robe, this indicates that this young man will soon marry a girl of high status, position, and morals. The presence of the symbol of a boy, child, or boy has important meanings and indications, The most important of which we will learn about in this article. Most Muslim interpreters say that carrying a boy or boy in a dream is worrying because God Almighty says (And she brought him to her people who carried him) Surah Maryam, verse 28. An immature child in a dream is interpreted as a weak enemy who shows his hostility and appears. His friendship sometimes. And whoever sees that he or his wife has given birth to many children in a dream, this indicates sadness and anxiety that may pass, because raising children comes only with difficulty. As for a man turning into a boy in a dream, this indicates the disappearance of masculinity and he may act ignorantly and deeply. But if one becomes a child in the dream, this may indicate one’s helplessness and dependence on others for one’s livelihood, and in some cases it may refer to the womb, especially if the person is sick or in distress. Seeing little boys in a dream often indicates easy fears. It can be overcome. As for a boy or girl in a dream, it represents fertility, glory, and comfort after hardship. And an infant in a dream is a good activation, and there is good hope. Interpretation of a child in a dream When you see a beautiful child in a dream, this is a sign that the dreamer will marry soon, and his marriage will be successful and happy. And in the event that you see For a child with a rough appearance and dirty clothes, this indicates a period full of worries and fatigue. As for a spoiled and beloved child in a dream, it heralds days of happiness, comfort, and tranquility. As for a crying child, seeing him in a dream indicates failure that will affect the dreamer. Seeing a sad child in a dream indicates problems and fears, while a laughing child is a symbol of a happy married life, livelihood, and prosperity that the dreamer will enjoy. For a spoiled child, seeing him in a dream indicates happy days and abundant wealth that the dreamer will enjoy. If the child is seen crying in a dream, this portends the failure that he will face in reality. Interpretation of a child in a dream by Ibn Sirin. If you dream of seeing many beautiful children, then this It portends success and blessings. If a mother dreams that her child is a little sick, she may see him as healthy, but other little things may bother her. if

title: Interpretation of a dream about crying

preview.html: There are also those who cry out of fear, and in today’s article we will talk about the interpretation of the cry of a man and a woman in detail via the website gptafser.com/. Interpretation of seeing crying in a dream for one girl. When an unmarried girl dreams that she is crying in a dream and the crying was intense. It is a sign of joy and they will soon hear the happy news. As for an unmarried girl who sees herself crying loudly in a dream for someone who died a long time ago, in reality. This means that the deceased must pray over her, and pray for her. And if an unmarried girl sees herself in a dream, she will regret and cry bitterly. It is a sign that she is feeling frustrated and frustrated due to multiple traumas. Failure and the feeling of being unable to achieve anything useful in her life. The unmarried girl who dreamed that she was sitting alone in a dark place, and she was crying a lot and no one heard her. It is a sign that he feels lonely and isolated and has no Friends in life. If an unmarried girl sees that she was crying and sad in a dream, this indicates that a bad event has occurred that will negatively affect her, and God knows best. As for the engaged woman who sees herself crying and screaming loudly in a dream, this is a sign of breaking off the engagement and not consummating it. What if A single girl saw herself crying loudly but without a sound in a dream. This means that she will marry a respectable person who will be the reason for happiness and a sense of security. See also: Interpretation of dreams for crying with heartburn. Interpretation of seeing crying in a dream for a married woman. As for a married woman who sees herself crying loudly in The dream. This is evidence that she will hear the good news that may be news of pregnancy. Whoever sees herself crying silently without a sound in the dream. This is a sign of her feeling of family stability and her husband’s love for her. As for the married woman who dreams that she is crying out loud and crying, it is an indication There are many disagreements between her and her husband, and she feels upset because of that, and God knows best. A married woman dreams that she is in a room alone, and cries loudly without any of her family hearing her. This means that she is very interested in her family’s affairs. As for a married woman who is watching her children, she is sitting She is crying next to her and they are trying to console her. It is a sign of her children’s success in school. If a married woman sees herself crying in the dream while screaming, this means that she is suffering from severe financial hardship, and God knows best. A married woman dreams that she is crying and slapping herself in a dream. This is a sign that she She will leave her husband due to divorce, and God knows best. Interpretation of seeing crying in a dream about a man and its meaning. When a man dreams that he is crying loudly and in a loud voice in a dream. This indicates that he is suffering from a crisis or suffering in his life. As for a man who dreams of crying in his sleep, it is a sign of losing someone. He loves him to death, and God knows best. And when a man dreams of seeing people around him crying in a dream, it is a sign that these people will benefit because of the fortune-teller. And if a man sees a dead person crying in a dream, this indicates the dead person’s need for the fortune-teller’s prayers over him. And if the man sees himself crying loudly, High in a specific place in a dream. It is r

title: Interpretation of seeing cotton in a dream in detail

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing cotton in a dream in detail: Cotton is one of the agricultural crops that brings comfort, security, and happiness to the human heart, but is it also true to see cotton in the world of dreams? In this context, we will inform you in this article about the interpretation of seeing cotton in a dream in detail, so follow us. Interpretation of seeing cotton in a dream Dream in detail: Seeing cotton in a dream is one of the visions that carry many meanings and many associations for the dreamer, and the interpretation of this dream varies depending on the social and psychological state of the dreamer. Scientists and dream interpreters have unanimously agreed that seeing cotton in a dream is generally auspicious, and its meaning varies depending on some subtle details in the dream. The dream. Al-Nabulsi interpreted seeing cotton in a dream as a sign of the dreamer’s purity, the purity of his heart, and his continuous efforts to repent of his sins. While Ibn Sirin interpreted seeing cotton in a dream as a sign of the abundance of goodness and abundance of livelihood, and it is also evidence of the dreamer’s distance from disobeying God Almighty. Scientists have interpreted the vision of picking cotton in a dream as a sign of earning a lot of money from a successful trade, and it is also evidence of success in general, whether in professional life or in study. Buying cotton in a dream indicates a blessing for earning a livelihood, health, and children, and it may be It is also a sign of a new trade or business that will benefit the dreamer. While selling cotton in a dream indicates the satisfaction of desires and ambitions, overcoming difficulties and crises, and resolving problems and disputes - God willing. Cotton clothes in a dream indicate goodness and security for the dreamer. It also indicates the dreamer’s piety, asceticism, and humility. As for seeing cotton transformed into clothes in a dream, it is a sign of near success on the personal and professional level, or a brief rest after a period of pain and sadness. Burning cotton in a dream is a sign of the dreamer’s bad intentions and actions, and that he will face many problems and face many obstacles. Whether in his professional or personal life. Interpretation of seeing cotton in an unmarried girl’s dream. Scientists have interpreted the vision of picking cotton in an unmarried girl’s dream as a great success on the practical level for the girl in the coming period of her life. Hugging an unmarried girl with cotton in a dream means that she will soon marry someone. A just and rich man. An unmarried girl who buys cotton in a dream indicates abundant kindness, blessings, and abundance of livelihood. But if an unmarried girl sees in her dream that she is saving cotton, this indicates that she will soon obtain a lot of money - God willing. Interpretation of the vision of cotton In a married woman’s dream, scholars interpreted seeing cotton in a married woman’s dream as a sign of the husband’s abundant livelihood and that God Almighty will provide him with a lot of legitimate money - God willing. Selling cotton in a married woman’s dream indicates that she has achieved great success in her professional life or that she has solved a problem. difficult in her family life. Picking cotton in a married woman’s dream indicates goodness, blessing, and coverage in her family life. While keeping cotton in a married woman’s dream indicates

title: Interpretation of seeing a soldier in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a soldier in a dream in detail and in successive and organized paragraphs that we present to you through our website. We always want to provide the best for our readers and highlight this interpretation that includes good connotations for the viewer and sometimes may include a warning sign for him. The introduction is not sufficient to mention everything that results from these dreams and visions, so we will give Our pens to write and provide the most prominent interpretations, follow us. See also: Seeing a promise in a dream. Interpretation of seeing a soldier in a dream. Seeing a soldier in a dream has several cases. In dreams, the soldier is a protector of his country, and in other dreams he can be frightening to the dreamer. It was said that he was seen in times of war And fighting is an indication of huge changes in a person’s life, to prepare for them and prepare for them. While the soldier in the dream was carrying a gun, this represents the dreamer’s protection, as well as the strength and strong influence that he will have in his life. A person may also dream in a dream that he is a soldier and wearing military clothing, Which in reality is considered a sign of confrontation with an opponent or competitor. When the dreamer goes to war with a soldier in a dream, this is evidence of this dreamer’s internal conflict and confusion in his feelings and thoughts. The dream may come from his feeling of failure for something he was waiting for. It has been said about scholars that seeing Military figures, regardless of their rank, in a dream are a sign of the dreamer’s ambition and great success, and God knows what is being said. They specialize in those soldiers who protect and defend the homeland, not mercenaries or terrorists. See also: Entering the police academy in a dream. Interpretation of one’s dream of seeing a soldier. Among the indicators that indicate... If you see a soldier in an unmarried girl’s dream, we mention the following: If a soldier smiles in an unmarried woman’s dream, this is evidence of her relationship with a young man of influence and status in the army, and God knows best. If her husband is well-known, then her dream expresses her strong personality and the decisive decisions she takes. If she The girl is angry in her dream of seeing the soldier, as this indicates either her rejection of the one who proposes to her, or that she admires a young man who does not suit her and who is in a bad mood. The soldier presenting the girl with flowers in a dream is a sign of success and the fulfillment of her desires, and God knows best. See also: Backgrounds in a dream, Ibn Sirin’s interpretations in Dreaming about seeing a soldier. Ibn Sirin considered the soldier a strong sign of commitment and discipline towards the dreamer, in addition to adherence to social norms and customs. The dreamer who dreams of seeing a soldier described him as having a strong personality and being loved by the people around him. On this basis, he interpreted a woman’s dream if she saw her husband as a soldier, as A good personality. If a person dreams of seeing a soldier crying, this is a sign of him abandoning his principles and mistreating those around him. See also: Holding a friend’s hand in a dream. Interpretation of the soldier’s vision of a man. Soldiers standing in a man’s house in a dream and smiling are a sign of two things, either marriage or death, and God knows best. If a person dreams that he is running away from a soldier, then his dream shows his weakness of character and his lack of responsibility. While the fortuneteller is wearing soldier’s clothes and sees soldiers in the dream, this is a good sign.

title: The 8 most famous interpretations of seeing a penguin in a pregnant woman’s dream

preview.html: What is the interpretation of seeing a penguin in a married woman's dream? Evidence of optimism with a good blessing. Interpretation of seeing playing with a penguin in a man's dream? Evidence that he heard a lot of good news. What is the interpretation of a married woman raising a penguin? It indicates achieving goals and abundant livelihood. Interpretation of seeing a penguin in a dream? Evidence of kindness and good luck. What is the interpretation of seeing a black and white penguin? Details of marriage and insight. Interpretation of a dream about a penguin by Ibn Sirin The penguin in a dream shows tolerance and peace. Seeing a penguin in a dream is a sign of good luck and wealth. Eating penguin eggs in a dream is a sign of happy events. Penguin eggs show kindness and nutrition. Slaughtering a penguin in a dream is evidence of the dreamer's livelihood. Grilling a penguin in a dream is one of the unpleasant visions. If the dreamer sees a penguin flying in the sky in a dream, this indicates a wide diet. Cooking a penguin is evidence of a steady monthly income and a permanent livelihood. Seeing a penguin dream for singles Seeing a black and white penguin in a dream means marriage and insight. Seeing a penguin flying away is good news for success. The penguin in The dream shows affection, love and tolerance. The penguin in an unmarried girl's dream indicates success and dreams come true. If an unmarried girl sees herself raising a penguin at home, this indicates good luck. Interpretation of a dream about a penguin for a married woman Seeing a penguin in a married woman's dream is evidence of optimism, kindness and blessing. The penguin in a dream indicates an abundance of money and psychological stability. Caring for a penguin in a married woman's dream is a sign of good news. If a married woman sees that she is raising a penguin, this indicates achieving goals and a spacious living. Seeing a dream about a penguin for a pregnant woman The penguin in a pregnant woman's dream indicates good and good news about a lot of money. The penguin in a pregnant woman's dream can indicate the safety of the fetus. The white penguin in a pregnant woman's dream is a sign of the birth of a male. The penguin in a dream can indicate the death of anxiety, passion, sadness and distress. The penguin in a dream indicates a natural birth for a pregnant woman. The penguin in general in a pregnant woman's dream indicates the elimination of childbirth problems. Interpretation of a dream about a penguin for a man Playing with a penguin in a man's dream is evidence that you will hear a lot of good news. Penguin dancing in a dream is A sign of kindness. Seeing a penguin playing games in a dream means that the dreamer is a person full of hope. Seeing a penguin running away in a dream means achieving goals. A penguin running after the dreamer is a sign of good luck. Seeing a penguin laying eggs in a dream is an indication of the dreamer's wife's pregnancy. Hatching penguin eggs in a dream indicates the marriage of a single person. Chasing a penguin in a dream is evidence of pursuing the dreamer's goals. Catching a penguin in a dream is a sign of achieving the dreamer's goals. title: Interpretation of avocado in a dream Eating avocado in a dream

preview.html: The meaning of mango and avocado fruit for the single, married, pregnant and divorced woman, whether she drinks the juice, buys from the market, or picks from the rotten yellow-green tree of Ibn Sirin, etc. Interpretation of avocado in a dream: If you see an avocado in your dream, this indicates fertility and the desire to have sex. Avocado also indicates wealth, skill and potential. Seeing an avocado in a dream also indicates efforts that will lead to important results. It is a very beautiful vision, and it suggests that you are going through some developments that generate happiness, and it also expresses the disappearance of longing and the end of brokenness. Sometimes it indicates the presence of a person returning from exile, and sometimes it indicates the return The dreamer himself from the outside. It shows well in any sudden situation and developments, and the dreamer will be very surprised by it, and also be grateful and satisfied with these events and situations. It also expresses working in extreme sports and setting one's goals by working to enjoy the excitement that revolves around life. It also expresses living in an unconventional way. He is exceptional and creates fantasies and dreams to work towards achieving them, but in order for him to achieve all these dreams, he must show the courage to stick to them. It also shows that everyone is shy and can succeed in their work, and some of his family members and those at work say that he cannot do this job, which is what It shows everyone's amazement. From a health standpoint, it shows that he is still in a stable condition, and that he is making effort and fatigue to enjoy every moment of his life. Whoever sees an avocado in his dream, his energy and strength will rise and he will stop in some situations in his life. Interpretation of avocado juice in a dream If you see avocado juice in a dream, this indicates that the efforts made will not have results as you expected. This may indicate haste. As for drinking avocado juice, it indicates a feeling of inadequacy in the health sector. Interpretation of an avocado tree in a dream. If you see an avocado tree in a dream, this indicates a prosperous future. Interpretation of eating avocado in a dream expresses experiencing beautiful situations and his inability to stand on his feet due to the intensity of his enthusiasm and happiness. . It represents standing and sitting as a dream builder and the day will come when he will see those dreams come true and thanks to that, he will not think about the past and focus on his present in his work. Because of some of the problems that the man went through, some of the health problems that he was suffering from, and the leave that he took from work after that, his return to work will have its noise and greatness. And he will return more enthusiastic than before. For single people, the dream indicates their compatibility with their friends and on the one hand they will begin to enter into romantic relationships. The interpretation of buying avocados in a dream expresses a person giving himself high value, and the dream carries with it non-interference in people’s lives and the interest of each of them in his life. It also indicates the new decisions that the dreamer will make, establishing some partnerships, forming a life completely different from his previous life and feeling the power that will make him do whatever he wants. Interpretation of avocado in one’s dream says

title: What is Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of seeing the sea in a dream?

preview.html: What is the interpretation of seeing the sea in a dream according to Ibn Sirin? Seeing the sea is one of the dreams that many people wish for in all their dreams. To find out what meanings things from the future may bring to you and to fully learn the interpretation of the sea in a dream, follow us in our next article on the Information Store website. Interpretation of a dream about the sea in a dream by Ibn SirinThe sea in a dream is full, according to Ibn Sirin, symbolizing power, influence and control Which the dreamer enjoys in his life, so his field is like the field of the sea, wide and deep, with no end in sight. It is as if seeing the sea expresses great power that God will gain in the near future. Seeing multiple successive sea waves also expresses an increase in livelihood, kindness, and blessing in money for the pioneer who saw himself swimming in the sea permanently and balanced without fear of the waves, and his vision showed that. He achieved many ambitions and dreams in life and made great strides in the field of work. Seeing the sea portends happiness and optimism in life and symbolizes the fulfillment of desires and aspirations that one has striven for for a long time. Whoever sees himself carrying a boat and taking out some sea water from it, it will appear to him in his vision. Abundance of provisions and goodness on its way to him. The sea in a dream for a bowl. Seeing a calm sea and calm waves in a single person’s spring symbolizes psychological stability, balance, and a stable family life that single people enjoy. While seeing a calm sea with turbulent waves in an ordinary woman’s dream, this indicates pressures What she feels makes her go through a bad psychological state due to some family problems or professional difficulties that make her feel a lot of negative emotions. God knows best. The rough sea can also symbolize a common woman who faces many problems in social life, such as disagreements with friends or disagreements with colleagues. Interpretation of a dream about a calm sea in a dream about a vessel. Seeing a calm and clear sea in a girl’s dream reflects the calm and stable life that she enjoys. Thanks to her morals and excellence in studying or working hard. Seeing a clear and calm sea in a person’s dream expresses that she is a girl loved by everyone around her for her good qualities such as generosity, giving, and reaching out to help others without expecting anything in return. The peaceful and stable outlook of individuals also expresses Also about progress and excellence, whether in the field of studies or in professional life. A woman who sees herself in a dream swimming completely in sea water easily without encountering difficulties in its waves, under the pretext that the common woman enjoys a stable life and her vision can be good news for the club employee with a man manners . She is loyal to her religion and loves it very much. What is the interpretation of a dream about the sea for a married woman? Seeing the sea full in a dream for a married woman indicates feelings of anxiety and confusion in her life regarding the life requirements of her family. The woman feels very anxious about the future and is always lost in her life. The vision also symbolizes ambition.

title: Interpretation of a dark face in a dream for different occasions

preview.html: Through this article you can see the interpretation of seeing a black face in different situations, and suddenly changing the color of the face in a dream to black is one of the visions that cause anxiety and fear in dreamers, which some consider a sign of something disturbing. In fact, this state is also a metaphor for the anger and resentment that some people suffered in the pre-Islamic era when they were born female, as stated in the Almighty’s saying in Surat An-Nahl in verse 58 (And if any of them is given news of a woman, his face will be dark, and this Is it similar to the unfortunate interpretation of this vision?) We will learn it through an encyclopedia.Interpretation of the dark man in a dreamInterpretation of the dream of the dark face of the single womanAs for the black face in the dream of the unmarried woman, seeing this in the eyes of the parents is a sign of disobedience, and it also expresses how much they need her help.In the event that A single woman saw that a familiar person turns black when he proposes to marry her. This vision serves as a warning message to the dreamer that he must be careful not to take something that could harm her. As for the darkness of the friends’ face, this vision expresses falling into a major crisis that requires help. The dreamer. Seeing a sister’s dark face in a dream indicates the state of anxiety and sadness that her sister is suffering from as a result of a crisis in reality. Darkening of the face in a dream for a married woman. Seeing a black face in a dream for a married woman indicates that she is going through crises in reality, but in the event that she sees a black face on her husband This vision expresses the dreamer’s desire to help her husband and participate in it. Great responsibilities fall on his shoulders and cause him sadness and anxiety. If a well-known person among his relatives or friends sees that the color of his skin changes to black, then this vision expresses that the dreamer is going through a major problem in his life that requires help and assistance from the dreamer. Also, seeing a dark face in Those who are close symbolize illness, and God knows best. Interpretation of seeing a black face in a dream for a pregnant woman: If a pregnant woman dreams that she gives birth to a child with black skin, then this dream is good news for her. But if the dreamer’s face turns black, this vision expresses the birth of a boy if he is wearing green clothes. If he sees that he is wearing white clothes, this vision shows the birth of a child, and God knows best. As for seeing a black face on the husband, this vision indicates the extent of his strength and his ability to bear the burdens of life. Interpretation of seeing a black face in a dream for a man: If the dreamer sees that his face is brown and he is wearing white clothes, This vision is good for him and indicates goodness and living. If the dreamer sees a darkening of the face in another person he knows, then this vision symbolizes that this person is going through crises and this vision also shows the extent of his need for help from those around him. Seeing a darkening of the face in the father or mother indicates To the extent they disobey them as they should. However, if the dreamer dreams that the one who wants to marry her in a dream is controlling her face, then this vision indicates that the dreamer is going through a financial crisis or his desire to find a new job opportunity. These were the most prominent interpretations of seeing a dark face in the solution.

title: Interpretation of punishment in a dream

preview.html: The interpretation of retribution in a dream is one of the most important visions that many people are afraid to question, because retribution involves taking a right, and retribution can be about bloodshed. Hence the fear that people feel when they see someone taking revenge on them in a dream. Almighty God has prescribed retaliation among men. In order to preserve the soul, the Almighty said in His Great Book: “And for you is a life of reward, O people of understanding.” God Almighty has made the implementation of retaliation a life for people. Because if retaliation had not been prescribed. Because people shed each other's blood, and God has commanded reasonable people to take revenge. Because people have the right to implement it. Together, let us learn about the interpretation of retribution in a dream for a man, a single woman, and a married woman through our encyclopedia.Interpretation of punishment in a dreamInterpretation of seeing a man being punished in a dreamIf he sees in a dream that someone is taking revenge on him; This is evidence of the weakness of the character of this person, who is unable to confront anyone with his faults and is not good at dealing with people. This weak character is what helps people obtain their rights, and it also indicates this person’s bad intentions? He does not do anyone's good but wants everyone to fail in order to succeed and does not treat people honestly. Rather, it appears to them to be contrary to what is hidden, and seeing a person taking revenge in a dream. Evidence that this person has suffered grave injustice in his life and that people have abused his rights and he cannot take back this injection, but this right dominates his thinking even in his sleep. And if someone sees that someone is taking revenge on him in a dream. This is evidence that he does not fulfill the duties of God Almighty, who commanded his servants, and does not avoid what God has forbidden. This is an indication that this man is forced to perform these duties and does not perform them to seek God’s satisfaction. It contains a warning from God Almighty about the necessity of repentance and returning to Him, and adherence to what God Almighty has commanded and what God has forbidden. So that she does not face severe torment in this world and the hereafter. Interpretation of seeing an unmarried woman taking revenge in her dream: If an unmarried woman sees that someone is taking revenge on her. This is evidence that this person holds this woman hostility and hatred. This is an indication that you should avoid this person. So that she does not fall into what she does not like in her life, and the same applies if a single woman sees punishment in a dream. This is evidence that she has committed many sins in her life and she must repent and seek forgiveness from God Almighty, and repent for what she went through, and if the single woman sees that she is taking revenge on someone. This is evidence that he does not like this person. This is because he created many problems for her in her life, and she wants to stay away from him, but she does not understand. Interpretation of retribution in a dream for a married woman: And if a married woman sees that there is someone taking revenge on her? This is evidence that this woman hates the one she takes revenge on, but if a married woman sees that there is someone taking revenge on her, this is evidence that this person does not love her, but if this woman sees that her husband is the one taking revenge on her. This is evidence of the instability of marital life between them and that this relationship will not last long, and if a woman sees a punishment in a dream. This also indicates length

title: Interpretation of a dream about an earthquake and an earthquake in a pregnant woman’s dream

preview.html: Seeing earthquakes in the houses in our house, whether light or strong, the earth is splitting, pronunciation of testimony from the earthquake by Ibn Sirin. The earthquake expresses psychological vibration, and after that the Lord can witness new and positive experiences. An earthquake in a person’s dream can express a psychological crisis or problems that the girl may face in her life. , which would cause instability or lack of stability and balance. Seeing an earthquake in a person’s dream can express his fears and insecurity about the future or the unknown. If an unmarried girl sees that she survived a minor earthquake, this is her expression that she will overcome the difficult stages of life that she must After this, security, stability and balance are achieved, whether practical or emotional. As for earthquakes and earthquakes that cause damage and destruction, they are warning signs in the vision of the consequences of taking risks or making wrong decisions, because this can lead to serious and unfortunate consequences. A dream of an earthquake often portends For a married woman, there are real problems that need to be dealt with in a radical way, as an earthquake or mild earthquake in this context is considered one of the indicators of differences or imbalance. Family or social life in general. If a married woman sees that the earth is trembling and it opens or tears, then this is a good expression if water comes out of the earth. If a married woman sees that the earth is trembling and inhaling, and smoke or fire comes out from within her, then this is an expression of the presence of some psychological problems or worries. On the horizon or in the future. As for a married woman who sees in her dream that the earth is being torn apart after an earthquake and gold, treasures, or money comes out of her stomach, this is a good expression, as the dream indicates the presence of positive energy in the married woman. . Which enables her to achieve her goals in life. A dream can be an expression of important material or social changes. An earthquake or an earthquake in a pregnant woman’s dream expresses the approaching time of childbirth, and sometimes an earthquake in a dream simulates the event of childbirth or the situation in the unconscious sphere of the pregnant woman, that is, in the subconscious, and therefore it is a psychological preparation for this event Joyful and painful at the same time. An earthquake in a woman’s dream is generally considered a positive thing and a good sign if it does not cause destruction or loss in the dream. An earthquake in a man’s dream can be a warning of financial or material losses. If the dreamer sees that he survived the earthquake, this is a good expression and indicates overcoming adversities and difficult stages in life, such as diseases, debts, and family disputes. Earthquakes, explosions, volcanoes, and floods in a person’s dream predict important changes in the future, often related to work or social status, and often These transformations are positive if the earthquake does not cause buildings to be demolished and destroyed. An earthquake in a man’s dream may mean profound changes or gaps in his life, but earthquakes, tremors, and even earthquakes are still good for the patient, the debtor, and even the traveler. Seeing houses shaking in a dream indicates instability The seer, where the house is represented in e
